body.name: Home Office Chair Mid Back Computer Desk Chair with Lumbar Support Armrest, Ergonomic Adjustable Breathable Swivel Rolling Gaming Chair for Home Office Work
features: Outstanding Home Office Chair - Our desk chair boasts an ergonomic design with built-in lumbar support and a supportive backrest, promoting spinal health and alleviating back pain from prolonged sitting.

Premium Materials - Crafted with high-density elastic sponge cushion covered in breathable mesh fabric, ensuring both comfort and durability. SGS-certified gas pressure regulator supports a maximum capacity of 240 pounds.
Flexible Adjustments - Smooth-rolling casters protect your floors, while the computer chair's adjustable height handle accommodates various desk heights.
Soft and Comfortable - Enjoy breathable mesh back and seat, along with a spacious cushion that maintains its shape even after extended use.

Quick Assembly - Complete accessories and instructions provided for effortless setup of this ergonomic chair. Should you have any questions, please don't hesitate to contact us; we're here to assist within 24 hours.
body.description: Why choose our office computer chair?Hight adjustable- Our desk chairs with wheels are ergonomic and suitable for people of all sizes;360 degree swivel - allows the gaming chair to be more flexible while working;SGS certified high grade gas pressure lifters - adjustable to different desk heights to meet different sitting preferences;High back office desk chair with lumbar support and headrest - our comfortable arm chair is perfect for intense gaming or long hours of work;Premium quality materials - Our mesh home office chairs are designed with skin-friendly and breathable mesh fabric, so you won't feel stuffy or sweaty when you sit on them, and your body stays cool!Thick cushion - For optimal comfort;Best choice for gifting - Our reading chair is perfect for teenagers, office workers, best friends and more.SpecificationColor: PinkMaterial: Mesh, MetalProduct Size: 18.5""D x 17.32""W x 38""HProduct weight: 17 PoundsMax Weight：240 Pounds

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars East set ip
reviews.reviewText: Fastest set up ever, very sturdy and light weight. Works great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Don't get this one
reviews.reviewText: The seat had a hole in the mesh. Contacted customer service but because it was so expensive to ship, you have to pay for return shipping. The quality control sucks. When you put it on the base, it doesn't even sit right and is wobbly....get another one or don't get this brand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice-looking chair, but it's not very comfortable and the sturdiness as is (using what was provided in the box) is questionable. Assembly was difficult. Also, the instructions were unclear about which screws to use. In fact, I would say put together the back of the chair and arms before the base of the chair. Also, I ended up swapping out the provided screws with longer ones to increase the sturdiness of the chair, otherwise, the ones provided would just slip out. I struggle to remember why I even got this one over the other chairs available. Will eventually swap this out too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My first reason is because when I bought it I already knew that it would be very pleasing for my buttocks and now while I’m typing my gluteus Maximus is very comfortable. 😁😍

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It’s a really nice chair. It is definitely worth the money. Better than I thought it would be. It was pretty easy to put together and that is saying a lot since I don’t have any building skills at all. The reasons why it doesn’t get five stars is it is very loud and the wheels don’t roll smoothly. But it is very comfortable and I would definitely buy again. I also love that it was free shipping. Even though it took a while to get here, it was worth the wait.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Easy to put together but.....
reviews.reviewText: ... Easy to put together but it came with tears in the headrest and strings exposed. It is so hard and not cushioned at all. Am going to have to get something else to put onto it in order to use it.Wishing I would have gone with something else

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars What a deal!
reviews.reviewText: Chairs today are no less than $60 the cheapest. I bought this for my daughter and she is sooo happy. :)Assembly was easy too, it is missing one screw. But honestly it doesn’t matter, it’s still good.There were a few things that gave it the vive of a cheaper chair like plastic build. But I’m saying this for a $36 dollar chair. This is a great value for the price. It’s great for kids! My daughter thanked me a lot!Thank you 😊 to the seller for providing a chair for a good value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Defective, Unable to Refund, Do not buy
reviews.reviewText: I am on a very tight budget and I needed a chair for my tall teenage son as his had given out. This seemed to be a good option for the money but I did not read all of the reviews. When we got the chair the box had no markings on it as though it had been bought from a moving store not that it belong to a company. The chair could not be put together, the arms that were given didn't match the bottom of the chair and four adults made an attempt but determined that the screws sent were not for the chair, the holes did not line up, and it was defective. I then went to try and return the chair, only to be given a label that would not print as it was in asian text of a language I'm not familiar with. We also had to pay for shipping. Given this chair was 32 dollars after taxes, and oversees shipping would likely be more than the cost of the chair, I ate my losses. I just gave this company 32 dollars for nothing.
